Html:
Hi,

Is it possible that the GoogleSatellite could no longer work??  Everything else works fine.  I know if you use their imagery on a website, you need a special key to get it to work.  Could it be that they are blocking imagery to my IP address??  Has anyone else had this problem?

Thanks,
you just download to much data, keep sure that your cache mode istt to ServerAndCache
Is there a work-around for this?  I've seen some posts for the  'proxy' on here.  Will that solve this problem?  Whenever I try it, then nothing works, but maybe I am just using it wrong.
usualy you arebanned for only 24h. Can you see them in maps.google.com ?

Hi,

It seems to be working again.  Why does this happen?  Is there a way to avoid it?  Do you know if the same thing will happen with YahooSatellite or VirtualEarthSatellite??

BTW:  I always have it set to ServerAndCache.

Thanks
cache your area, and use it, if you reach limit, you can try to use proxy, or swith to other map type
